Name: body
Description: Main text in Markdown format

Name: body-html
Description: Main text in HTML format

Name: country
Description: Shortcut for country - defaults to country.name

Name: country.id
Description: Id for country used by ReliefWeb

Name: country.iso3
Description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code

Name: country.name
Description: Name of country in English

Name: country.primary
Description: Flag to indicate this is the primary country

Name: country.shortname
Description: Short name of country where applicable, for example 'Syria' for 'Syrian Arab Republic'

Name: date
Description: Shortcut for date fields - defaults to date.created

Name: date.changed
Description: Date entry modified on ReliefWeb (ISO 8601)

Name: date.created
Description: Date entry created on ReliefWeb (ISO 8601)

Name: date.original
Description: Date entry first published by original source (ISO 8601)

Name: disaster
Description: Shortcut for related disaster - defaults to disaster.name

Name: disaster.id
Description: Id for related disaster used by ReliefWeb

Name: disaster.name
Description: Name assigned to the disaster based on the ReliefWeb disaster naming convention

Name: disaster.glide
Description: Global IDEntifier number (GLIDE) of the disaster

Name: disaster.type
Description: Disaster type of the associated disaster. Note this may be different to the `disaster_type` of a report. Defaults to disaster.type.name

Name: disaster.type.code
Description: Code for the disaster type of the associated disaster.

Name: disaster.type.id
Description: Id for the disaster type of the associated disaster.

Name: disaster.type.name
Description: Link for values

Name: disaster.type.primary
Description: Whether this is the primary disaster type for the associated disaster.

Name: disaster_type
Description: Shortcut for disaster type - defaults to disaster_type.name

Name: disaster_type.id
Description: Id for disaster type used by ReliefWeb

Name: disaster_type.name
Description: Link for values

Name: disaster_type.code
Description: GLIDE hazard code for disaster type.

Name: feature
Description: defaults to feature.name

Name: feature.id
Description: Id for feature used by ReliefWeb

Name: feature.name
Description: Link for values.

Name: file
Description: File attachment shortcut - defaults to file.id

Name: file.description
Description: Description of file attachment

Name: file.filename
Description: File name of file attachment

Name: file.id
Description: Id of file attachment used by ReliefWeb

Name: file.mimetype
Description: MIME type of file attachment

Name: file.preview
Description: Shortcut for preview image of file attachment - defaults to file.preview.url

Name: file.preview.url
Description: Link to preview image of file attachment

Name: file.preview.url-large
Description: Link to a large preview image with a width of 680px

Name: file.preview.url-small
Description: Link to a small preview image with a width of 200px

Name: file.preview.url-thumb
Description: Link to a thumbnail preview image with a maximum width of 220px and a maximum height of 100px

Name: file.url
Description: Link to file attachment

Name: format
Description: Shortcut for content format - defaults to format.name

Name: format.id
Description: Id of content format used by ReliefWeb

Name: format.name
Description: Link for values

Name: headline
Description: Shortcut for headline - defaults to headline.title

Name: headline.image
Description: Shortcut for headline image - defaults to headline.image.id

Name: headline.image.id
Description: Unique id of headline image used by ReliefWeb

Name: headline.image.mimetype
Description: MIME type of the headline image

Name: headline.image.filename
Description: File name of the headline image

Name: headline.image.caption
Description: Caption attached to the headline image

Name: headline.image.copyright
Description: Copyright attached to the headline image

Name: headline.image.url
Description: URL of the headline image

Name: headline.summary
Description: Summary of body, if report is selected as headline. Typically 180-190 characters long

Name: headline.title
Description: Headline text, if report is selected as headline. Typically 100-120 characters long

Name: id
Description: Unique id of report used by ReliefWeb

Name: image
Description: Image shortcut - defaults to image.id

Name: image.caption
Description: Caption attached to the image

Name: image.copyright
Description: Copyright attached to the image

Name: image.id
Description: Unique id of image used by ReliefWeb

Name: image.mimetype
Description: MIME type of the image

Name: image.filename
Description: File name of the image

Name: image.url
Description: Link to the original image

Name: image.url-large
Description: Link to a large image with a width of 680px

Name: image.url-small
Description: Link to a small image with a width of 200px

Name: image.url-thumb
Description: Link to a thumbnail image with a maximum width of 220px and a maximum height of 100px

Name: language
Description: Shortcut for language - defaults to language.name

Name: language.code
Description: ISO 639-1 code of the language the entry is written in

Name: language.id
Description: Id for language of report used by ReliefWeb

Name: language.name
Description: Language the report is written in - Link for values.

Name: ocha_product
Description: Shortcut for OCHA product - defaults to ocha_product.name

Name: ocha_product.id
Description: Id of OCHA product used by ReliefWeb

Name: ocha_product.name
Description: Link for values

Name: origin
Description: Url of original report when it was added to ReliefWeb

Name: primary_country
Description: Shortcut for primary country - defaults to primary_country.name

Name: primary_country.id
Description: Id of primary country used by ReliefWeb

Name: primary_country.name
Description: Link for more information

Name: primary_country.shortname
Description: Short name of country where applicable, for example 'Syria' for 'Syrian Arab Republic'

Name: primary_country.iso3
Description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code

Name: source
Description: Shortcut for sources - defaults to source.name

Name: source.disclaimer
Description: Disclaimer information for the source

Name: source.id
Description: Id for source used by ReliefWeb

Name: source.name
Description: Common name of source

Name: source.longname
Description: Official name of the source if different from source.name

Name: source.homepage
Description: URL of the source's primary website

Name: source.shortname
Description: Short name of the source, typically an acronym e.g. UNICEF

Name: source.spanish_name
Description: Spanish name of the source

Name: source.type
Description: Shortcut for source type - defaults to source.type.name

Name: source.type.id
Description: Id for source type used by ReliefWeb

Name: source.type.name
Description: Link for values

Name: theme
Description: Shortcut for theme - defaults to theme.name

Name: theme.id
Description: Id of theme used by ReliefWeb

Name: theme.name
Description: Link for values

Name: title
Description: Title of report

Name: url
Description: Canonical url

Name: url_alias
Description: Friendly' url of the report
